Nov. 20, 1954 D Wigan Contest
Wigan Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Wigan Contest wigan-contest
Test Piece Contest
Memories of Wagner
Drill Hall, Powell Street, Wigan Prizes - 1st £25 and cup, 2nd £15 and cup, 3rd £8 and cup, 4th £4 and cup. Best local band (£3 and cup) Blackrod. Promoted by Haigh Band. 21 bands competed
March 15, 2013, 2:11 p.m. April 21, 2019, 8:41 a.m.

2 Cadishead Band Joseph Stevens
3 Lindley Band Peter Wadsworth

Unknown Result Blackrod Public Percy Bullough
